climbs.name: You Can Call me Al, Dude

content.description: Fun route nearest the right facing corner that essentially begins the east face of Penstemon. This route is to the left of "It's Barry Time" from the Kroll guide. 6 bolts to a 2 bolt anchor with rap rings.
content.protection: 6 bolts. 2 bolt anchor with rap rings. Probably need a 70m .
content.location: First bolted route on the East Face of Penstemon. Left of It's Barry Time.

content.description: Another fun slab route on the east face. 10a+ crux between bolts 2 and 3. Easier once you suss it out, but 10b/c until then. This route was stiff exfoliating quite a bit on our climb. Good, long, and with a very well protected crux. There are two bolts at the anchor but no rings. An old untrustworthy red sling was tied between the two anchor bolts 10/5/19, and what appeared to be a newish wire crab. I left another on the other bolt for a safer trip back to earth. 9 bolts. No gear required.
content.protection: 9 bolts. Two anchor bolts, each with a carabiner. Most of the nuts were loose on what appeared to be new bolts. Hand tightened all. 70m Was good to have. Once the draws have been removed, climber can swing to climber's right and reach the ground.
content.location: Route GG in the Kroll guide. 2nd route from the left on the east face. Just left of You Can Call me Al, dude.

content.description: 1st pitch is fun easy 4 bolts of very 5.7 slab to a hollow sounding sandy bench/flake. 2nd pitch is superb through 3 bolts of great, fairly vertical, well protected thin face/slab. Angle eases after 3rd bolt. This route is still exfoliating, choose foot placement wisely and shower your belayer in granite bits.
content.protection: P1 - 4 bolts to a 2 bolt rap anchor. P2 - 5 bolts to a 2 bolt rap anchor. Need two ropes to rappel from P1. P2 can be rapped with 1 70m rope.
content.location: Right-most bolted line on the east face of Penstemon.

content.description: A fun easy option for a warm up. You will need two ropes. The crux is a good length between bolts 6 and 7.
content.protection: 8 shiny new bolts and a two bolt anchor with rap rings.
content.location: 100 feet right of a vegetated bench. Can begin in an alcove above bolt 1.
